Perceptor::


Perceptor looked and smiled when he saw Nighlight kill RockSeeker and 
answered "Nope, those pests are forcing us to join maxis... but it 
seems that my sweet assistant has killed one, perhaps will be worty 
bring her back our ranks once all this mess ends"
